pros: It is the best multingpot representation on earth. On board the ship, we have lot of opportunities to meet people coming from all over the woworld. The multicultural  is one of the most important thing you can benefit from Mercy Ships.
cons: Meeting new people, new culture leading to a  positive self improvement.

pros: First I wanted to find out what is like to work on board a ship and in a multicultural environment . Second of all I know providing translation services over there can help me to increase my knowledge
